--------------------------------------
Test the MC-integration routine by calculating the area of an unit circle:
The area is 3.14157936586471 with an error of 1.04719753907592 (should be 3.14159265358979)




10 2.59181393921158 1.01610887389545
100 3.06894332347553 1.04579140214104
1000 3.13388593411146 1.04723655585392
10000 3.14051825344596 1.04719321007341
100000 3.14146059318376 1.04719749254291
1000000 3.14157936586471 1.04719753907592
10000000 3.14159085011255 1.04719755119552

100 3.29874504802562 0.179787687328665

10000 3.13431074649245 0.0180816346737723

1000000 3.13955524812683 0.00181419207862278
10000000 3.14173096465254 0.000573612588529131


 The error for the quasi MC stays more or less constant while the error for the plain MC scales with 1/Sqrt(N)
